## Quarto

**Paper**:

Sandau, N., Fabian, Y., Bruggisser, O.T., Rohr, R.P., Naisbit, R.E., Kehrli, P., Aebi, A. and Bersier, L.-F. (2017), The relative contributions of species richness and species composition to ecosystem functioning. Oikos, 126: 782-791. <https://doi.org/10.1111/oik.03901>

**Data set doi:**

Sandau, Nadine et al. (2016), Data from: The relative contribution of species richness and species composition to ecosystem functioning, Dryad, Dataset, <https://doi.org/10.5061/dryad.44bm6>

## Running Code

When you click the **Render** button a document will be generated that includes both content and the output of embedded code. You can embed code like this:

```{r}
1 + 1
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 * 2
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
